item.description:
Welcome to everyone intrigued by Neuro-Linguistic Programming (NLP). Here are the details of the August meeting of the Greater Boston NLP group.

This month we will introduce Time Line Therapy (TLT) which is similar to hypnosis regression therapy, only using specific modalities.

NLP has a concept called the Time Line. the presupposition is that everyone's unconscious mind organizes memories in a temporal manner - from past to future and that most people perceive their past in a specific direction and their future in another a specific direction. TLT was designed to take advantage of that and create a scenario where negative emotions, limiting decisions, and many other issues could be eliminated by going back to the root cause, via the time line. It is exciting!

Reference can be found in Time Line Therapy and the Basis of Personality, by Tad James.

As always, I should be there by 6:30 to answer any questions or have any discussions that won't be covered in the evening.

Come and enjoy and evening For a Change.

Kevin

Kevin Martin
NLP Master Practitioner, Master Hypnotherapist
Positive Effects
kenda_assoc@msn.com
978-273-5905
----------------------------------
Helping you to become the you that you want to be:
Coaching, Counseling, and Training
item.how_to_find_us: Go straight back to the large studio (after 7pm)
